name: Gemstoned Adventures: A Dynamic Fantasy Text RPG
description: An immersive text-based adventure game powered by Gemini. Explore Veridia, a shared, persistent world where ancient sci-fi technology and psychedelic nature collide. While every journey is unique, you will walk the same world as other players, encountering legendary items, places, and characters. The narrative is generated dynamically in bite-sized chunks for a fast-paced experience.
